# Suspend Disease (Spell)
## Overview
[[Abjuration Spells|Abjuration]]

**Level:** [[1st Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 1]], [[1st Level Druid Spells|Druid 1]], [[1st Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 1]], [[1st Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 1]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 2nd-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 2]], [[BoXM 2nd-Level Druid Spells List|Druid 2]], [[BoXM 2nd-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 2]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, M (a drop of bile)

**Range:** Touch

**Target:** One creature

**Duration:** 24 hours

**Saving Throw:** Fortitude negates (harmless)

**Spell Resistance:** Yes (harmless)

**Source:** Book of Vile Darkness (WotC)Â­, pg. 106

This spell keeps a disease already infecting the subject from harming him for that day. The disease is in no way cured, and the subject cannot make a save to throw off the disease.

Casters who intend to cast spells with a disease component find this spell particularly useful.
